message:
2019-01-04

=====Material URLs=====

Video: https://edition.cnn.com/2019/01/02/cnn10/ten-content-thurs/index.html

Transcript: 오늘은 transcript대신에, 자막으로 시청해주세요. 비디오 화면의 오른쪽 하단의 cc를 누르면 볼 수 있습니다.

Instead of transcripts, please watch it with subtitles. You can view it by pressing cc in the lower right corner of the video screen.

뉴욕 주식 거래소는 세계에서 가장 규모가 큰 거래소 중 하나입니다. 이 거래소에서 가장 사진이 많이 찍혀 유명해진 트레이더의 이야기를 들어보세요.

The New York Stock Exchange is one of the largest exchanges in the world. Listen to the story of a trader who's become the most photographed and famous on this exchange.

====Video Contents====

00:00 - 01:55
U.S. plan to withdraw its troops from Syria.

01:55 - 05:45
a look back at a volatile year for the U.S. stock market. And story of one of the most famous trader in New York trade center.

05:45 - 09:10
The art of photographing.
